sys_ui_message.message: Data Points are the template that drives logic to advise a user on specific data that needs to be captured for Scheduled Maintenance Orders -> Maintenance Order Data and Site Walk Thrus -> Site Walk Thru Data. Data points connect user-editable data including Questions, Answers (with Drop Down Choices) and Fail Paramters (drives functionality of new Maintenance order creation for a specific CI that failed the maintenance check). For more information, you can view the Knowledge article, Data Point Desktop Procedures for step by step instructions on how to create Data Points and the data records that feed into this process.
